Text:
Was curious about this but cant play it.

Like many .MOV files this file is a pain in the ass.
Audio but no video.

Vlc, Quicktime, WMP it doesnt matter...

If anyone manages to play this or convert it to a more reliable format plz tell me how to play or post the link here to the new file...

The video is just the straight up H.264 from the original FLV inside a QT enclosure, because I didn't want to transcode it.  If you can play the original streaming web version, you should be able to play this, but if you want I can re-upload in a different format, just tell me what you prefer.

I can play the streaming web version but my pc sucks at showing it nicely without stuttering.
Normal i burn it for my dvd player.

If you can, and if its not to much im asking i would like a other HD version.
It doesnt matter wich format.

I tried to encde the file and convert it; but nothing worked.  I went to the Website; and can play the stream; however, this file I cannot get to show video - audio is there.

Play upload it in another format.

Thanks

Here it is as a DIVX AVI:

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5784878/Doctor_Laser_-_One_Of_Worlds_Last_Holographers_DIVX_AVI

Sorry the file size is larger - I tried uploading a 1MBps DIVX that was about the same size, but I kept getting a weird "File Size Error" from TPB.  I think it might be related to the many errors on TOB right now such as not being able to edit torrents.  Anyway after trying a number of things that didn't work (including a text file, putting in a folder, etc.) making the file size larger seemed to do the trick.
